example.description: Creates a new Auto Scaling group with the specified name and other attributes.

example.code: New-ASAutoScalingGroup -AutoScalingGroupName my-test-asg -LaunchConfigurationName my-launch-cfg -MinSize 2 -MaxSize 4 -AvailabilityZone @("us-west-2a", "us-west-2b") -Tag @( @{ Key="Key1"; Value="value1" }, @{ Key="Key2"; Value="value2" })
example.description: Creates a new Auto Scaling group with the specified name and other attributes.
